thread.title: Barrhead Travel offers expert Antipodean advice
thread.title_full: Barrhead Travel offers expert Antipodean advice

title: Barrhead Travel offers expert Antipodean advice
text:
Barrhead Travel offers expert Antipodean advice 15 July 2015 Source: Tourism Australia 
The Australia and New Zealand team will be based in the agency’s flagship Oswald Street store in Glasgow. 
It will be staffed by personnel who have visited both countries and travelled extensively in them to ensure they are offering the best advice. 
Kevin Preston, member of the Australia and New Zealand team, said: “I went travelling to Australia and New Zealand a few years ago and really enjoyed my time in both. 
“My experience is benefiting me greatly at Barrhead Travel and customers are more confident asking my advice because I have already visited these places. 
“Both countries have a lot to offer and I would encourage anyone looking to book a holiday to either Australia or New Zealand to visit us in Oswald Street to ensure they have the best trip when they go.” 
Barrhead Travel chief executive Sharon Munro added: “We are pleased to be further growing our relationship with partners on the other side of the world. 
“Offering the best service is our number one priority at Barrhead Travel and we have invested heavily in our staff to ensure our customers reap the benefits. 
“Our dedicated staff have all been trained specifically to offer the best advice and more exclusive travel packages to our customers.”
